name: IBM's TPM 2.0 TSS
short_description:
This is a user space TSS for TPM 2.0.  It implements the functionality equivalent to the TCG TSS working group's ESAPI, SAPI, and TCTI layers (and perhaps more) but with a hopefully far simpler interface.

It comes with about 80 "TPM tools" that can be used for rapid prototyping, education, and debugging.

It supports Windows (Visual Studio 2013 or mingw) and Linux builds.

This is a beta release.  There are no known bugs, but not all cases have been tested.  I welcome (1) bug reports, (2) documentation requests, (3) suggestions for ECC tests, and (4) requests for features for which you have an immediate need.
